com.barryholroyd.prodlisthpdemo

Class ActivityProductList

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.barryholroyd.prodlisthpdemo.preferences.SharedActivities
        • com.barryholroyd.prodlisthpdemo.support.ActivityPrintStates
          • com.barryholroyd.prodlisthpdemo.ActivityProductList

  • public class ActivityProductList
extends ActivityPrintStates
    This is the main activity -- it lists the products.

    Clicking on a product will call ActivityProductInfo to display product-specific information.

    See Also:
    Walmart Products API (mock), Documentation

      • onSaveInstanceState

        protected void onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle outState)
        Save the array of products already pulled from the cloud so that it can be used immediately by onCreate() after a device reconfiguration.
        Overrides:
        onSaveInstanceState in class ActivityPrintStates
        Parameters:
